lead_paragraph: Russia was responsible for more doping violations than any other country in 2014, while track and field was the sport with the worst doping record over the year, according to the World Anti-Doping Agency.

headline.print_headline: Russia Tops Doping in 2014, Athletics Has Most Cases
headline.main: Russia Tops Doping in 2014, Athletics Has Most Cases
